import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unassign SLA from ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/unassign-sla"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes the service level agreement (SLA) assignment from a ticket. After this operation, the ticket will no longer be tracked against SLA response and resolution time requirements.

**Behavior**
- Clears the SLA assignment from the ticket
- SLA metrics and timers are stopped
- Does not delete SLA history or past violations

**Use Cases**
- Removing SLA when ticket scope changes
- Clearing incorrectly assigned SLAs
- Exempting specific tickets from SLA tracking

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/sla](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-assign-ticket-sla) – Assign an SLA
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/sla](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-sla) – Get current SLA

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"UUID of the ticket to remove SLA from","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
